p: Hb mass, anthropometric and training characteristics of the NT and TC groups were presented as the mean Â± standard deviation (SD). After passing a normality test (Shapiro-Wilk) and an equal variance test (Brown-Forsyth), differences in Hb mass between the NT and TC groups at ages 16 and 19 were calculated with the Student's t-test. Effect sizes were calculated after Cohen (Cohen, 1988).
